Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: The strength of the inflate/deflate operation. Higher values cause drastic shifts in shape formation.

Flub.Name: Scale
Flub.Description: The amount of details to preserve. Higher values cause more prominent shapes to form.

Flub.Name: Inflate
Flub.Description: Whether to inflate the terrain. Off deflates the terrain.

Flub.Name: Preserve Fidelity
Flub.Description: This creates a fixed recurve shape at any resolution.
